segments.text: This whole situation is incredibly frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone not notice a sink overflowing right in front of them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring onto the floor, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the cabinets, I'm sure of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are in a genuinely dangerous position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is going to tip, I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's absolutely irresponsible to leave things like this unattended.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene is just screaming for an intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm disgusted by the sheer negligence displayed here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could all be avoided so easily if someone just paid attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to yell at them to stop and look!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury and damage is immense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This quiet chaos is truly unsettling to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, just turn off the faucet!
segments.speaker: PAR
